pay-card.leyend: The crypto revolution meets your wallet

Faqs.question1: How do I create my account on COINPAY?
Faqs.answer1: Download the Lemon Cash app, register with your information, and start trading in crypto.
Faqs.question2: How do I deposit money into my Lemon account?
Faqs.answer2: You can deposit pesos into your Lemon CVU from any bank or non-bank account, and it will be credited instantly. You can also deposit cryptocurrencies!
Faqs.question3: How do I withdraw money from my Lemon account?
Faqs.answer3: You can withdraw your pesos to a bank or virtual account whenever you want, and it will be immediate!
Faqs.question4: How do I request my Lemon Card?
Faqs.answer4: You can request your Lemon Card free of charge from the 'Card' section within the app, indicating the address where you want to receive it.
